title: Spirals of Dietheld
name: spiral
description: Every day, 4 people are summoned atop the fingers of the embalming hand, inside of a large network of caves. Within the caves, are 4 mighty orders, blessed by powers of 4 gods. What you decide to do in the world will ultimately pave your story forward.
creator: Eimi#8826
credits: Bence for offering suggestions to the world
